successes.title: Mare Nostrum - Empires
successes.description: 'Mare Nostrum - Empires': Lead your Empire to greatness and glory!

Pledges.description:
Supporter - Thank you! 
We appreciate your interest in supporting our project with your donation. You will receive all updates and newsletter information on the project and will be able to comment and ask questions.
*Memorial Day Weekend Special* for our first 72-hour campaign supporters.
Your own advance copy of 'Mare Nostrum - Empires', plus all of the stretch goals that are met during the campaign.
We have reserved some limited edition Designer's Signature Decals for supporters who wish to add one to their pledge for an additional $5 when filling out the campaign survey.

You can choose English, French, German, Italian, Polish or Spanish language editions when we send out the campaign survey. English language games include free shipping within the continental USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section for this project.
Your own advance copy of 'Mare Nostrum - Empires', plus all of the stretch goals that are met during the campaign.

You can choose English, French, German, Italian, Polish or Spanish language editions when we send out the campaign survey. English language games include free shipping within the continental USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section for this project.
Limited Designer's Copy: Your own advance copy of 'Mare Nostrum - Empires' that includes a limited edition Designer's Signature Decal, plus all of the stretch goals that are met during the campaign.

You can choose English, French, German, Italian, Polish or Spanish language editions when we send out the campaign survey. English language games include free shipping within the continental USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section for this project.

Limited Designer's Copy: Your own advance copy of 'Mare Nostrum - Empires' that includes a limited edition Designer's Signature Decal, plus all of the stretch goals that are met during the campaign. 
We added this pledge level in the response to the popularity of the Designer Signature Decal. Serge Laget has kindly agreed to sign 500 more.
You can choose English, French, German, Italian, Polish or Spanish language editions when we send out the campaign survey. English language games include free shipping within the continental USA. All other countries please check the "Shipping" section for this project.
